This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. usage of the word FREE is not allowed


 

A valid lead is:


A person clicks on the advertising media delivered from the advertiser and is forwarded to a landing page of the advertiser


The person registers by completing all of the required fields with their own data, agrees to the opt-in text and accepts the terms and conditions.

A registration is defined as correct when the mobile number is from a person in DE when the registered mobile 

number passes through the mobile number control filter of the advertiser. The mobile number control filters are programmed 

to eliminate incorrect registrations. Only those registrations passing advertiser's control filter are counted as a lead that 

qualifies for payment of commission

Only users with Android Smartphones and iPhones that have the operator Vodafone Germany and T-Mobile (D1) Germany can pass through advertiser's mobile number control filters

In order to run this offer with Adwords, please contact your account manager.


Allowed Traffic Types:

1. Web display

2. On site advertising

3. Email traffic (opt-in bases only)

4. Search advertising (with key words restrictions, see below)

5. SMM (paid advertising only)

Traffic Restrictions:

1. Affiliates are not permitted to display banners on adult and porn websites

2. No incentives are allowed

Creative materials:

The publishers are allowed to use creative materials that:

1. We provided with;

If affiliates want to create materials to promote our sites themselves, these materials should:

2. Have our logo or domain name;

3. Got our approval after review;


Any kind of pop traffic is not allowed 


NOTE: The publishers are not allowed to use our creative materials or design other materials, similar to our creative materials (banners, landing pages, etc.) to promote any other sites. All creative materials are considered to be our intellectual property and can’t be used to promote any third parties’ sites.


Key Words Restrictions:

1) Affiliates are not permitted to advertise in search advertising using keywords specific to AnastasiaDate, RussianBrides, AsianBeauties and AmoLatina (e.g. AnastasiaDate, Anastasia Romance, Anastasia International, AnastasiaWeb, Anastasia, RussianBrides, AsianBeauties, AmoLatina, etc.) and variations in terms of punctuation, spelling, the addition of words and/or the addition the addition of top-level domains (e.g. AnastasiaDate.com…).

2) Affiliates are not allowed to use exact matches or any variations of Dream-marriage.com, GlobalLadies.com, CharmingDate.com, ChnLove.com, Cupid.com and other dating sites.

3) Affiliates are not permitted to use the following words as metatags, keywords, hidden text, texts for advertising materials or other terms: “foreign affair”, “loveme”, “foreignladies.com” and permutations of these words and phrases; and the exact phrases “foreignladies.com”, “foreignwomen.com” and “asiansingles.com.”

4) Affiliates are strictly prohibited to use the following words as metatags, keywords, hidden text, texts for advertising materials or other terms: “Hot Russian Brides”, “HotRussianBrides.com”, “Russian Love Match”, “RussianLoveMatch.com” and variations in terms of punctuation, spelling, the addition of words and/or the addition the addition of top-level domains. (e.g. Hotrussianbrides.com, etc.)


Advertiser retains the right to refuse leads if it is found they have been generated by bots, script or other invalid methods. In such cases Advertiser will provide CPA company with detailed evidence of such leads, which will be considered inappropriate if:

• They were generated from the same IP address;

• Password and/or login was generated by a publisher’s script;

Advertiser also retains the right to reject payment for leads if their number exceeds the campaign budget as indicated in this IO.

code on himself, he / she is sent to the
website and receives a message that the
activation was successful.

triggered at the moment of
activation.
